name: Caelyn Sandel's Tiny Utopias
description:
Created too late to be an entry in the TinyUtopias IF Jam, this is a collection of four pieces of small dynamic fiction. These digital rest stops exist for you to feel safe and at peace, using color and sound to create a peaceful environment.

Click to open in fullscreen. Headphones recommended.

All ambient noise was sourced from freesound.org and mixed by me, as well as the Palm River music. Palm river art by Carolyn VanEseltine.
